description:
Add extra storage without sacrificing your water bottles, and help reduce waste in our waterways. Water-resistant construction keeps contents dry in most rainstorms, and plenty of reflective elements ensure you stay visible in questionable weather. The easy on-off design is a breeze to use when coming and going.

  • Oceanweave® fabric is made with reclaimed fishnets
  • Water-resistant stiching and a polyurethane coating keep contents dry
  • Polyurethane stiffeners maintain bag shape
  • Daisy chain and 4 Velcro® straps secure bag to bike frame
  • Soft-lined phone pocket and keychain clip
name: Axiom Seymour Oceanweave Podpack P1.0 Tube Bag
